data: “That room in the third story is good enough for any elder,” my mother was saying as I came into the library; “more than likely they’ll send us a country elder anyhow, and he’ll never know the difference—he’ll think it’s the spare room, I reckon.”

"That room in the third story is good enough for any elder," my mother was saying as I came into the library; "more than likely they'll send us a country elder anyhow, and he'll never know the difference--he'll think it's the spare room, I reckon."
